N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7612.2 - Showers

State Regulations
(a) There shall be
sufficient bathing facilities to permit prisoners to have hot showers at least
three times a week. Water for showers shall be thermostatically controlled to
ensure the safety of the prisoners. (b) Consistent with the department's health
requirements, the chief administrative officer shall require prisoners to
shower periodically and when certain work assignments or activities
mandate. Notes
